AltTitle.translated: Demand: With supervision of respected Masud Barzani leader of Kurdistan Region, and with event of the first anniversary of Lalesh Genocide, Higher body of Lalesh Center under the slogan "Kurd's freedom movement owed to Shingal's strength and resistance." Held in Lalesh near Dihok on Monday 3/8/2015
